SELECT device.id AS id, device.number AS number, device.ip AS ip, device.apk_version AS apkVersion, device.mac_id AS macId, device.cup_id AS cupId, device.online_time AS onlineTime, deviceOrder.shop_id AS shopId, shop.name AS shopName, device.create_time AS createTime FROM zmsk_device device INNER JOIN zmsk_shop_device_order deviceOrder ON deviceOrder.device_id = device.id LEFT JOIN zmsk_shop shop ON shop.id = deviceOrder.shop_id WHERE 1=1
AND device.number LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
AND device.apk_version LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY device.create_time DESC

SELECT device.id AS id, device.number AS number, device.ip AS ip, device.apk_version AS apkVersion, device.mac_id AS macId, device.cup_id AS cupId, device.create_time AS createTime FROM zmsk_device device WHERE device.id NOT IN (SELECT device_id FROM zmsk_shop_device_order )
AND device.number LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
AND device.apk_version LIKE concat('%', #{u.searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY device.create_time DESC
